data.markdown:
## Description

The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." The logo features the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.385,t=0.042,r=0.614,b=0.086), with ID c45e40e0-890a-48b4-9ac3-9c691f14e83c -->

# K 5 PREMIUM SMART CONTROL FLEX eco!Booster <!-- title, from page 0 (l=0.070,t=0.155,r=0.774,b=0.210), with ID 2c945490-2ea2-4843-9e95-66e169045fdf -->

## Text

Für mehr Performance: der Hochdruckreiniger K 5 Premium Smart Control Flex eco!Booster mit PremiumFlex-Schlauch, G 180 Q Smart Control-Pistole, Schlauchtrommel und eco!Booster Kit. <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.070,t=0.230,r=0.916,b=0.255), with ID a9c19f32-68f5-4e04-a00f-51b60819bdd8 -->

## Description

The image depicts a pressure washer set, which includes several components:

1. **Pressure Washer Unit**: 
   - The main body is predominantly yellow with black accents.
   - It features a handle on top for easy maneuverability.
   - There is a hose reel integrated into the design for convenient storage of the hose.
   - The unit has wheels for portability.

2. **Accessories**:
   - Two different nozzles are shown:
     - One nozzle appears to be a flat surface cleaner, designed for cleaning large, flat areas.
     - The other nozzle is a more traditional spray wand, likely adjustable for different spray patterns.
   - A bottle of cleaning solution is included, suggesting the pressure washer can be used with detergents for enhanced cleaning.

3. **Branding**:
   - The brand name is visible on the pressure washer and the bottle of cleaning solution, indicating a cohesive product line.

This set is likely intended for home or light commercial use, suitable for cleaning driveways, patios, vehicles, and other surfaces. The design emphasizes ease of use and versatility, with the inclusion of multiple nozzles and a detergent option. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.325,t=0.274,r=0.711,b=0.596), with ID 5206df5b-00b0-4eae-a37e-800595b0613e -->

## Key-Value Pair

Bestell-Nr.: 1.324-687.0 <!-- key_value, from page 0 (l=0.076,t=0.606,r=0.383,b=0.615), with ID 1c9a1f0e-8b32-42e0-8c22-9c6f106af5ba -->

## Text Details

- Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung
- Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff
- Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.079,t=0.627,r=0.342,b=0.657), with ID 3d2ba141-5c97-47d0-8026-d8b05fdabae2 -->

## Technische Daten <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.076,t=0.669,r=0.164,b=0.677), with ID 6a8e474d-8c74-4883-b2fc-6bad45bd7bd3 -->

## Technische Daten

- **EAN-Code**: 4066529133038
- **Stromart**: V / Hz: 230 / 50
- **Druck**: bar / MPa: 20 - max. 145 / 2 - max. 14.5
- **Fördermenge**: l/h: max. 500
- **Flächenleistung**: m²/h: 40
- **Zulauftemperatur**: °C: max. 40
- **Anschlussleistung**: kW: 2.1
- **Anschlusskabel**: m: 5
- **Farbe**: gelb
- **Gewicht ohne Zubehör**: kg: 13.5
- **Gewicht inkl. Verpackung**: kg: 18.5
- **Abmessungen (L × B × H)**: mm: 417 × 306 × 584

## Ausstattung

- **Hochdruckpistole**: G 180 Q Smart Control
- **Multi Jet 3-in-1**: [x]
- **eco!Booster**: [x]
- **HD-Schlauch**: m: 10 / PremiumFlex
- **Teleskopgriff**: [x]
- **Integrierter Wasserfilter**: [x]
- **Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4"**: [x] <!-- table, from page 0 (l=0.066,t=0.672,r=0.489,b=0.829); page 0 (l=0.507,t=0.665,r=0.929,b=0.780), with ID 1044aab6-865f-4500-80fa-b9966a1f4097 -->

## Figure Description

The image is a graphic representation featuring a large number "1" on the left side, partially visible in a light gray color. Overlapping the number is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the text reads:

**WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE ONLINE BRAND**

The text is bold and black, centered within the yellow arrow. The design suggests a focus on being a leading or top-ranked brand in the freelance online market. The use of the number "1" and the phrase "WORLD'S NO. 1" emphasizes a claim of being the best or most popular in this category. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.860,t=0.384,r=0.929,b=0.414), with ID 0471f393-6ba3-4ae2-9de4-0743cac6043e -->

## Description

The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape with a circle of 12 stars, resembling the European Union flag. Below the shape, the text reads "Made in Europe." 

- **Shape**: The geometric shape is a stylized, angular design.
- **Stars**: The circle of 12 stars is a common symbol representing the European Union.
- **Text**: The phrase "Made in Europe" is written in a simple, sans-serif font, indicating the origin of the product or service associated with this logo. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.860,t=0.436,r=0.930,b=0.476), with ID f043112e-0098-4b24-9b0c-b03fd25913cf -->

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with a blue and white color scheme. The top part of the emblem reads "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" in white text on a blue background. Below this, there is a stylized trophy icon in the center, which is also white. The bottom part of the emblem contains the words "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, white text on a gold background. The overall design signifies an official recognition by Guinness World Records for holding a record. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.871,t=0.317,r=0.916,b=0.366), with ID 28e98e7b-e3a7-49f2-85ab-e3074ba56461 -->

## Description

The image is a circular icon with a teal background. In the center, there is a white outline of a smartphone. To the right of the smartphone, there are three curved lines, also in white, emanating from the phone. These lines suggest a signal or communication, possibly indicating wireless connectivity or a notification feature. The icon is simple and uses minimalistic design elements to convey its message. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.860,t=0.490,r=0.927,b=0.537), with ID eb35b993-0d00-42de-b043-ad7bfd2ff652 -->

## Description of Figure

The image is a warning sign with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized depiction of a road with a sharp left turn, represented by a thick yellow line that curves to the left. Below the road depiction, there is an arrow pointing to the left, also in yellow. 

Underneath the arrow, the text reads:

**"ROAD NARROWS"**

This text is in uppercase and is centered below the arrow. The overall design suggests a cautionary message, likely indicating a change in road conditions ahead, such as a narrowing of the road. The use of high-contrast colors (black and yellow) is typical for warning signs to ensure visibility and convey urgency. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.860,t=0.546,r=0.927,b=0.595), with ID 3c62d099-bcf1-47c1-a214-6785ff1fe70b -->

## Form Section

- [ ] im Lebenslauf enthalten <!-- form, from page 0 (l=0.514,t=0.774,r=0.616,b=0.782), with ID e7bcf06f-59ee-4fbd-9823-5c3b09236518 -->
